devdoc.author: CXIP-Labs
devdoc.details: The entire logic and functionality of the smart contract is self-contained.

Deposit(address,uint256).details: Event that is triggered when native token is converted into hToken.

TokenDeposit(address,address,uint256).details: Event that is triggered when ERC20 token is converted into hToken.

TokenWithdrawal(address,address,uint256).details: Event that is triggered when hToken is converted into ERC20 token.

Withdrawal(address,uint256).details: Event that is triggered when hToken is converted into native token.

constructor.details: Constructor is left empty and init is used instead

extractNativeToken(address,uint256).details: Send hToken, get back native token value equivalent.

params.recipient: Address of where to send the native token(s) to.

extractWrappedToken(address,address,uint.details: Send hToken, get back native token value equivalent.

params.recipient: Address of where to send the native token(s) to.

holographNativeToken(address).details: Send native token value, get back hToken equivalent.

params.recipient: Address of where to send the hToken(s) to.

holographWrappedToken(address,address,ui.details: Send supported wrapped token, get back hToken equivalent.

params.recipient: Address of where to send the hToken(s) to.

init(bytes).details: This function is called by the deployer/factory when creating a contract

params.initPayload: abi encoded payload to use for contract initilaization

isHToken().details: Temporarily placed to bypass bytecode conflicts

owner().details: Address of initial creator/owner of the token contract.

_supportedWrappers.details: List of supported Wrapped Tokens (equivalent), on current-chain.

devdoc.title: Holograph token (aka hToken), used to wrap and bridge native tokens across blockchains.

init(bytes).notice: Used internally to initialize the contract instead of through a constructor

userdoc.notice: A smart contract for minting and managing Holograph's Bridgeable ERC20 Tokens.
